name: @saekitominaga/customelements-input-switch
description: Implement something like <input type=switch> in a Custom Elements.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/InputSwitch.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.mjs -- terser dist/InputSwitch.mjs -o dist/InputSwitch.min.mjs -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=InputSwitch.min.mjs,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.min.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/InputSwitch.min.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:dts-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.mjs.d.ts -- cpy dist/InputSwitch.mjs.d.ts dist --rename=InputSwitch.min.mjs.d.ts

author: Saeki Tominaga
